_header: Good God make me for Thy love and Thy desire
Subjects: Christ, prayers to; prayers, to Christ
_description: A prayer to Jesus — one 9-line stanza

BLAdd37788.First Lines:
Swete Jhesu good god make mefor þi love & þi desire
                    lay down…
BLAdd37788.Last Lines:
…Endur þi wille to alle þat is resonRight &
                    soþe
BLAdd37788.Editions:
Brown,  Carleton Fairchild,
                        ed.  
             Religious Lyrics of the XVth Century.
         Oxford: Clarendon, 1939: 100-1.
